Title: Through and Through

Actors: Kelsey Grammer, Connie Nielsen, Hannah Ware, Jeff Hephner
Plot: Kane uses a tragedy in his personal life to further his political agenda and ultimately win control over the housing authority. Kane tries to remedy his fractured inner circle by poaching ...
